main.name: E.P. Haque
main.description: I'm an energetic US-based programmer who taught myself to code 8 years ago, and it's been one hell of a ride- Check out my portfolio!
main.bio: Hey there! I'm an American self-taught programmer who's been coding since 2014. I've never thought of it more than just a hobby until I discovered Web3. After indulging into the world of Web3, my focus has shifted towards building awesome decentralized protocols that are unique to the status quo! Check out some of my projects and feel free to contact me anytime through email or my website!
main.contactmessage: Like what you see? Reach out!

education.description: Attended a 4 year university while working full time as a High School Debate Coach and High School Substitute Teacher
